<S%G846>"Their<s%> <S%G2995>throat<s%> is an <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G5028>tomb.<s%> <S%G1100>With<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1100>tongues<s%> they have used <S%G1387>deceit.<s%>" "The <S%G2447>poison<s%> of <S%G785>vipers<s%> is <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5491>lips;<s%>"

<S%G846>"Their<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> are <S%G3691>swift<s%> to <S%G1632>shed<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> things the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> it <S%G3004>speaks<s%> to those who <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1722>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> may be <S%G5420>closed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> may be <S%G1096>brought<s%> under the <S%G5267>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> have <S%G264>sinned,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> fall <S%G5302>short<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>
